name: Verma
greetingText: I really like the way we meet and made a strong bond in a small time span...
wishText: Ye tho eek rasm-e-jahaan hai jo yaad hoti ha, varna chaand ki kaha salgirah hote ha....
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, Eveyone will do same for you today so I wanted to do something
outroText: I hope this unique and traditional way of making a wish brings a big smile to your cute face...
replayText: I want you to maintain that smile throughout your life...
